content: I'll definitely take a look at those options. I've been trying to be more mindful of the products I use in my bathroom, not just for my own health but also for the environment. Speaking of which, I've been trying to conserve water by taking shorter showers. I've been keeping track of my shower time, and I'm down to about 5 minutes per shower, which is a big improvement from the 10-15 minutes I used to take. Do you have any other tips on how I can reduce my water usage in the bathroom?
